column4: can anybody see this video? http://www.cbtnuggets.com/webapp/theater?op=view&id=19
it asks for a username and password... is it free registration?
drspin all I see is a dark screen, does not show the video, I dont know which application I need to install
if you give me a sec I'll try to set up an account and watch the vid
sure
sorry, didn't work: "Totem could not play 'mms://drm.cbtnuggets.com/freevideos/cisco/osi_model.wmv?embed'."
I've never even heard of the MSS2 codec, and I've got pretty much every codec under the sun installed
thanks for trying
my guess is that it has some sort of DRM that Totem can't handle (hence the drm.cbtnuggets.com address)
you might wanna try mplayer
it seems that is some problem installing mplayer, I have to wait untill its fixed
weird; didn't have that problem myself. don't bother though -- I just tried it in mplayer and it just sits there like a dead fish
I see
if you get that working please let me now
I'll see what I can do, but I'm pretty sure that file is DRM-restricted, and that's why it won't play
sorry I dont know what DRM-restricted means!
means it's got copyright protection control crap on it.
no, sorry... it segfaults when you try to run it, or once you close the window?
when I run it nothing happens, after 3 sec it just gives me that
weird. do any of the OpenGL screensavers work? (e.g., AntSpotlight, Flurry, Atlantis)?
I will try that
no they dont

looks like you don't have OpenGL working properly. Unfortunately I don't really use 3D much, so I never bothered to get it working... but check your /etc/X11/xorg.conf to make sure the GLX extension is enabled.
